comment: She is an amazing professor, she is understanding, and kind. She has a great vibe and is very inspirational when it comes to writing. Attendance is done by a small writing assignment in the beginning of class.

TAKE HER! She is amazing at what she does, even from through a screen. Had her my first year both semesters for BOTH 1101 & 1102 classes. Made an A in both. Quite minimal textbook use, if you ever need anything, just ask! Seriously! She's incredibly generous and understanding if you work with her. She cares about your understanding & grades equally
